ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?
ygData.msgSnippet: From time to time I try other resolutions but have always come back to 640 x 480: a) 17 monitor helps b) dont like the lag when switching windows c) do like
ygData.messageBody:
From time to time I try other resolutions but have always come back to 640 x
480:

a) 17" monitor helps
b) dont like the lag when switching windows
c) do like to open bags off the hot keys for switching stuff
d) dont like the really small fonts in the high res text

Sylly

p.s. P3-500 256m ram, Voodoo 3 3000

----- Original Message -----
From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 12:25 PM
Subject: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?


I was playing with different resolutions last night and I was wondering what
resolution everyone plays with.

I personally stick with 640 x 480 because I can't stand watching my monitor
switch resolutions when I switch to inventory or tracking mode.

Draelon
